select
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_TYPE = #{tableType} AND TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dbName} AND TABLE_NAME not like '%QRTZ_%'
AND CREATE_TIME BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
AND (TABLE_NAME like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') OR TABLE_COMMENT like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%'))
AND TABLE_NAME like concat('%', #{tableName} , '%')
AND TABLE_COMMENT like concat('%', #{comment} , '%')
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, TABLE_NAME ASC limit ${pageSize * (pageNum - 1)},#{pageSize}
